longBusinessSummary: C.Uyemura & Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells plating chemicals, industrial chemicals, non-ferrous metals, and other products in Japan and internationally. The company operates in four segments: Surface Finishing Materials, Surface Finishing Machinery, Plating Business, and Real Estate Leasing Business. It offers plating chemicals and machinery for printed wiring boards and aluminum magnetic disks; and plating processing for plastics, printed circuit boards, etc. The company is also involved in the leasing of office buildings, condominiums, and factory sites. The company was founded in 1848 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
